title: Inception
description: A skilled thief, who specializes in stealing secrets through dreams, is given a chance to erase his criminal history by planting an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest challenge yet when the Joker emerges from Gotham's underworld to wreak havoc and test the limits of morality.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of astronauts ventures into a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity as Earth faces environmental collapse.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men form an unlikely bond over the years as they find solace and redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of a powerful crime family transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers that the world he knows is a simulated reality and joins a rebellion to free humanity from its machine overlords.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household by infiltrating their lives and pretending to be unrelated, highly qualified professionals.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble one last time to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles, but their ambitions threaten their relationship.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the death of his father, only to return later to reclaim his rightful place as king.
